definition: variant of 耽誤|耽误[dan1 wu5]
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility

sentences.english: In order to avoid your valuable time, please choose other contact information.
sentences.chinese: 爲免擔誤您的寶貴時間，請選擇其它聯繫方式。

sentences.english: You're dead meat if you cool my heels like that again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再這樣擔誤我的時間，你就死定了。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting. We were a little late in getting underway.
sentences.chinese: 真抱歉，讓你久等，我們出發時擔誤了一會兒。

sentences.english: It won't be too long , sir.
sentences.chinese: 不會擔誤您太長的時間，先生。

sentences.english: Invite you the essential factor does not look for valuables but mistake time loses picul consequently fleeing for one's life chance.
sentences.chinese: 請您不要因尋貴重物品而擔誤時間以致失去逃生機會。
